alert_temperature_over.en: Ruuvi Temperature Alert: '{{name}}'{{#if alertData}} ({{alertData}}){{/if}} The temperature has reached {{currentValue}}{{alertUnit_symbol}} which is above the threshold of {{thresholdValue}}{{alertUnit_symbol}}.
